javmos

Class JavmosGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • javmos.JavmosGUI

  • public final class JavmosGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates the Javmos GUI and provides get and set methods to its JComponents. You can only modify it aesthetically but not any of its methods or layout.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JavmosGUI()
      JavmosGUI constructor.

      This method returns the GUI's current domain step value.

      This method returns the equation that the user has inputed into the GUI.

      This method returns the GUI's current maximum domain setting.

      This method returns the GUI's current maximum range setting.

      This method returns the GUI's current minimum domain setting.

      This method resets the GUI's settings to its original state.

      This method sets the equation representing the first derivative of the user's inputted equation.

      This method sets the GUI's coordinate label's contents and color based on the clicked point.

      This method sets the equation representing the second derivative of the user's inputted equation.
